i am in between classes.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing?
I am doing well too! I am looking forward to listening to my Ween album and savoring the memory of seeing them live in concert.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day! I love listening to music while I work on my dog's training.
Oh, what kind of dog do you have?
I have a Golden Retriever named Oliver. He is the best dog ever!
I bet! Golden Retrievers are so friendly and loving.
Yes, they are! He is always happy to see me and loves to play fetch.
I bet he is a great companion.
He is! I am so glad I have him in my life.
Well, it was nice to meet you and talk about dogs! Have a great day!
You too! It was nice to meet you too
